Hi

I am looking for a way to have my testcases getting loaded through a
custom classloader. Actually I would like to load some of them with
classloader A and some of them with classloader B.

Is there a way to inject a custom TestSuiteLoader into the TestRunner?
Creating my own TestRunner is probably no option as this is supposed
to work through Eclipse and maven.

I am using junit 3.8.1

cheers
--
Torsten
subject: custom classloader
